This project is the Cambridge Research UK Cambridge Institute (CRUK-CI) Java client for Clarity's REST API. This module provides a caching mechanism around the client for improved performance.

To use the client with the cache enabled, create a Spring application context including the classes {@link org.cruk.clarity.api.spring.ClarityClientConfiguration} and {@link org.cruk.clarity.api.cache.spring.ClarityClientCacheConfiguration}. The cache is set up with sensible defaults but these can be tuned.

@author Richard Bowers (richard.bowers@cruk.cam.ac.uk) @see EhCache
